original_text: Uzziah did things that the Lord said were good, as his father Amaziah had done.
korean_text: 웃시야가 그의 아버지 아마샤의 모든 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하며

sentences.original_text: Uzziah did things that the Lord said were good
sentences.korean_translation: 웃시야는 하나님이 좋다고 말씀하신 일들을 행했으며

sentences.original_text: as his father Amaziah had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 아마샤가 행한 것 같이
